sources.title: The Devil's Tomb | Full Movie | Action Horror | Cuba Gooding Jr | Ron Perlman
sources.description:
The Devil's Tomb - Mack and a team of mercenaries are contracted by a mysterious CIA operative named Elissa to rescue a scientist working on an archeological discovery deep under the Middle Eastern desert. With the help of a mysterious priest, Mack and his team discover the true secret of what lies beneath. A secret that has been protected for thousands of years, that is not of this Earth.
2009.  Stars: Cuba Gooding Jr., Ray Winstone, Ron Perlman, Taryn Manning, Jason London

metadata.Plot: A team of mercenaries under the command of hard-charging war veteran Mack (Gooding Jr.), are contracted by a mysterious CIA operative named Elissa (Cruz) to rescue a scientist (Perlman) working on an archeological discovery deep under the Middle Eastern desert. With the help of a mysterious priest (Rollins), Mack and his team soon discover the true secret of what lies beneath the sands. A secret that has been protected for thousands of years. A secret that is not of this Earth
metadata.Actors: Cuba Gooding Jr., Ray Winstone, Ron Perlman
